.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueTuple extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable, class System.IComparable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple>, class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple>
Public Structure ValueTuple Implements IComparable, IComparable(Of ValueTuple), IEquatable(Of ValueTuple), IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
public value class ValueTuple : IComparable, IComparable<ValueTuple>, IEquatable<ValueTuple>, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 提供用于创建值元组的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating value tuples.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和元素的序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of elements. 元组的示例是用来存储标识符，例如一个人的名称中的第一个元素，第二个元素，以及该人员的收入中每年的第三个元素中该年度的数据结构具有三个元素 （称为 3 元组或三元组）。An example of a tuple is a data structure with three elements (known as a 3-tuple or triple) that is used to store an identifier such as a person's name in the first element, a year in the second element, and the person's income for that year in the third element. 值元组是元组类型中引入[!INCLUDE[net_v463](~/includes/net-v463-md.md)]提供的运行时实现[C# 中的元组](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)和 F # 中的结构元组。Value tuples are tuple types introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v463](~/includes/net-v463-md.md)] to provide the runtime implementation of [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 它们与不同的元组类，如，等，按如下所示：They differ from the tuple classes, such as , , etc., as follows: - 它们是结构 （值类型） 而不是类 （引用类型）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 它们是可变而不是只读的。They are mutable rather than read-only. 也就是说，可以更改的元组组件的值。That is, the value of tuple components can change. - 其数据成员，如`Item1`，`Item2`等，是字段而不是属性。Their data members, such as `Item1`, `Item2`, etc., are fields rather than properties. 结构表示不包含任何元素的元组。The structure represents a tuple that has no elements. 它是主要用于其静态方法，可创建和比较值元组类型的实例。It is useful primarily for its static methods that let you create and compare instances of value tuple types. 及其帮助程序方法，可以实例化值元组，而无需显式指定每个值元组组件的类型。Its helper methods let you instantiate value tuples without having to explicitly specify the type of each value tuple component. 通过调用它的静态方法，您可以从零到八个组件创建具有的值元组。By calling its static methods, you can create value tuples that have from zero to eight components. 对于包含多个八个组件的值元组，您必须调用构造函数。For value tuples with more than eight components, you must call the constructor. ### 序列化和值元组Serialization and value tuples 类型不是可序列化在.NET Core 1.x 或.NET Framework 4.7 及早期版本中。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard，包括.NET Standard 2.0，不强制要求的序列化实例; 是否实例是可序列化取决于单个.NET Standard 实现。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要确定是否类型是特定的.NET 实现上可序列化，获得对象，表示类型并检索的值及其属性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. .NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的可序列化类型的列表，请参阅[二进制序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

span.span: Compares the current instance to a specified instance.
This method always returns 0.

remarks.format: Because a <xref:System.ValueTuple> instance has no elements, any two <xref:System.ValueTuple> instances are considered to be equivalent.

span.span: is not a instance.

summary.span: 创建新的值元组实例。

span.span: Creates a new value tuple instance.

A new value tuple with no components.

returns.span: 含有 1 个组件的值元组。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种帮助器方法，您可以调用来实例化一个 8 组件值元组，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate an 8-component value tuple without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用构造函数，以创建包含九个或多个组件的元组，除非您的语言为此提供了一种特殊语法。You must call the constructor to create a tuple with nine or more components unless your language provides a special syntax for this purpose. 静态方法结构不能用于创建具有九个或多个组件的元组。The static methods of the structure cannot be used to create a tuple with nine or more components.
